alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 7:22AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henry, western Louisa, southern Cedar, southeastern Johnson and Muscatine Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 721 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbus City, or near Columbus Junction, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grandview around 725 AM CDT. Conesville and Letts around 730 AM CDT. Fruitland around 735 AM CDT. Nichols around 740 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include West Liberty and Atalissa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
